My first post!

26 April, 2021

Hello to everyone out there,
this is my first post! I just updated my About page, where you can find information about me, who I am and the purpose of security.egg. For now, I am a newbie in the cyber security field with high goals. I aim to walk this path, with the most enthusiasm, and record my achievements, or even my failures, through posts in this blog.
